name: Successful login, search, add to cart and pay
scenarioId: login:Successful login, search, add to cart and pay
methodName: Successful login, search, add to cart and pay

testSteps.description: 1: Successful login, search, add to cart and pay ({user=miguel.saldarriagar@autonoma.edu.co, pass=uam_123*, term=Crystal, size=One Size for All, color=Gold, qty=2})

children.description: Given that the user opens DemoShop
User open demo shop
User opens the browser at http://demo-shop.cesaragudelo.com/
When the user logs in with username "miguel.saldarriagar@autonoma.edu.co" and password "uam_123*"
User login
User clicks on login entry point (link/button)
User enters 'miguel.saldarriagar@autonoma.edu.co' into username/email field
User enters 'uam_123*' into password field
User clicks on login submit button
And the user searches for "Crystal"
User search product
User enters 'Crystal' into search input field
User types 'ENTER' in search input field
And the user adds the first product to the cart
User addto cart
User clicks on first Add to Cart button
And the user selects size "One Size for All", color "Gold" and quantity "2" and adds to cart
User configure product
User clicks on size dropdown
User clears field select2 search input
User enters 'One Size for All' into select2 search input
User clicks on select2 option One Size for All
User clicks on color dropdown
User clears field select2 search input
User enters 'Gold' into select2 search input
User clicks on select2 option Gold
User clicks on quantity input
User clears field quantity input
User enters '2' into quantity input
User clicks on add to cart button
And the user goes to the cart
User go to cart
User clicks on cart icon
Then the product should be visible in the cart
Then login step definition$$ lambda/0x000001e1474a7258 should be (true)
When the user proceeds to checkout
User proceed to checkout
User clicks on proceed to checkout button
And the user completes the payment with method "Bank Deposit"
User complete payment
User clicks on payment dropdown
User clears field select2 search input
User enters 'Bank Deposit' into select2 search input
User clicks on payment option Bank Deposit
User clears field transaction information textarea
User enters 'Oprap87588f' into transaction information textarea
User clicks on pay now button
Then the user should see the successful payment message
Then login step definition$$ lambda/0x000001e1474dadb0 should be (true)
And the user goes back to dashboard
User clicks on back to dashboard button
And the user opens orders
User clicks on orders button
Then the user should see the purchased product "Crystal" in orders
Then login step definition$$ lambda/0x000001e1474db0e0 should be (true)

title: Successful login, search, add to cart and pay

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
When the user logs in with username "<user>" and password "<pass>"
And the user searches for "<term>"
And the user adds the first product to the cart
And the user selects size "<size>", color "<color>" and quantity "<qty>" and adds to cart
And the user goes to the cart
Then the product should be visible in the cart
When the user proceeds to checkout
And the user completes the payment with method "Bank Deposit"
Then the user should see the successful payment message
And the user goes back to dashboard
And the user opens orders
Then the user should see the purchased product "<term>" in orders
